procedure.title: Limerick Flood Relief Schemes - Ecology Surveys
procedure.description: Limerick City and County Council invites tenders for the provision of the services as described below Lot 1 Terrestrial Habitat and Flora Survey the Services comprise Habitat Survey, Annex I Habitat Survey and Flora Protection Order Species Survey of the Limerick City and Environs Flood Relief Scheme Area. Services also include the preparation and provision of associated reports, maps and survey datasets. Lot 2 Terrestrial Mammal, Amphibian and Reptile Survey the Services comprise Terrestrial Mammal Survey, Amphibian Survey and Reptile Survey of the Limerick City and Environs Flood Relief Scheme Area. Services also include the preparation and provision of associated reports, maps and survey datasets. Lot 3 Bat Activity and Habitat Survey The Services comprise Bat activity and habitat survey of the Limerick City and Environs Flood Relief Scheme Area. Services also include the preparation and provision of associated reports, maps and survey datasets .Lot 4 Freshwater Ecology Survey, Floating River Vegetation Survey and Estuary Survey the Services comprise Freshwater Ecological, Floating River Vegetation and Estuarine Surveys of the Limerick City and Environs Flood Relief Scheme Area. Services also include the preparation and provision of associated reports, maps and survey datasets.
